sentences.sContent: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.sContent_eng: They understood that our power alone cannot protect us, nor does it entitle us to do as we please.
sentences.sCn: 他们懂得单凭实力无法保护我们的安全，实力也并不赋予我们随心所欲的权利。

remMethod.val: en(使…) ＋ title(题目， 标题) → 给(书、 文章等)题名

words.tran: 给…权利；给…定书名；授…以荣誉（entitle的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to give someone the official right to do or have something
